author: ericvaandering
body:
Combination of what was requested in #12019 and #11964 .

The preferred form of both how one raises exceptions and catches them with `except` has changed in python 2.6 and python 3 will not take the old forms.

These changes were all done with futurize, an automated tool.

See See https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-3109/ and  https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-3110/#compatibility for details
title: Modernize exception raising and catching
